ygData.subject: Re: More robe questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: You can trade, sell, destory, mutilate, spindle, etc the robes you find on NPC s that you kill.  This means your tank could give the robe if they wanted to. -
ygData.messageBody:
You can trade, sell, destory, mutilate, spindle, etc the robes you find on
NPC's that you kill. This means your tank could give the robe if they
wanted to.

- Ziffnab

-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 9:12 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] More robe questions.


Do you have to be the one to LOOT the robe from him in befallen or can a
TANK loot the body then give you the robe??? Cus it would stink to have to
try to kill him again if a TANK accidentaly looted his body . . . (I you do
kill him for his robe right?)
